entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
